title: Dubai Bloomberg Square Mile Run 2016 by Asen Sokolov
descr: Web developer based in Dubai, UAE. With more than 8 year experience and more than 100 project behind his back.

articleInfo:
After 2 weeks rest and recovery from the injury which I got during the marathon I participated in Bloomberg Square Mile Run with my friends.The race was very interesting and fun.

The rules of the race are very simple: every team has 10 runners; every runner has to run 1 mile and pass the relay to the next runner; the team who finishes first is the winner.

Our team had only 9 runners so I had to run twice because I was in the best physical condition after all this months of preparation for the marathon. After an intense race we succeed to finish on 9 place from 50 teams for 1 Hour 12 Minutes and 58 Seconds . And my time for the first run was 6 Minutes and 31 Seconds and for the second 6 Minutes and 49 Seconds. It was a very interesting experience and i glad we made it and took place in top 10 :)))
